meanings.definition: a person who defeats an enemy or opponent in a battle, game, or other competition
meanings.sent1: The victor of the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team celebrated their victory with cheers.
meanings.sent3: The victor of the spelling bee proudly held up the trophy.
meanings.sent4: She emerged as the victor in the heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The victor's determination shone through in every competition.
